
Description

us_phone.opal is a network that can interpret US phone numbers. Phone numbers are matched according the regular expression:
(1?\s*-?\s*(\d{3}|\(\s*\d{3}\s*\))\s*-?\s*)?\d{3}\s*-?\s*\d{4}

The output format is XML.


Integration Notes


Known Issues


Custom Agents

com.dejima.library.regularexpression.RegularExpressionAgent
